function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Asymptomatic infections leading to undetected transmission","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement widespread proactive surveillance and testing, especially in high-risk areas","Technologies":"Advanced testing and surveillance technologies for early detection","People":"Populations in areas with high transmission rates","Owner":"Health authorities and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate understanding of human movement patterns","Impact":"Difficulty in designing effective elimination strategies and risk of resurgence post-elimination","Mitigation":"Utilize mobile phone data and call detail records for retrospective analysis of human movement","Technologies":"Advanced data analytics and machine learning for pattern recognition","People":"Public health researchers and epidemiologists","Owner":"Research institutions and data analytics organizations"},{"Description":"Mismatch of measures and locations for disease elimination","Impact":"Ineffective deployment of resources and potential loss of gains due to movement of people and parasites","Mitigation":"Use spatial risk maps for strategic placement of measures and resources, considering human movement patterns","Technologies":"Geospatial mapping and GIS software for identifying high-risk areas","People":"Public health authorities and policymakers","Owner":"Government agencies and public health organizations"}]}
